FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question table.

FIELD.NAME: executor
FIELD.COMMENT: the executor for this question

FIELD.NAME: responsefieldlines
FIELD.COMMENT: Approximate height, in lines, of the input box the students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: givencode
FIELD.COMMENT: the code given by teacher to be filled out by student

FIELD.NAME: testclassname
FIELD.COMMENT: the junit test class name

FIELD.NAME: junitcode
FIELD.COMMENT: the junit code given by teacher to test student's response

FIELD.NAME: solution
FIELD.COMMENT: sample solution

FIELD.NAME: signature
FIELD.COMMENT: expected students code signature for javap

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_studentcompiler
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_studentsignature
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_junitcompiler
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_times
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_counttests
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_junitheader
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_assertstring
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_assertexpected
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_assertactual
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: feedbacklevel_junitcomplete
FIELD.COMMENT: verbosity level of feedback for the student

FIELD.NAME: questionattemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question_attempts table.

FIELD.NAME: feedback
FIELD.COMMENT: the specific feedback generated by junit
